raja purushayo poththakatta soya merukandara danawwa watakalaha.kalyana mithraya ee thiranathmaka awasthawe mese kalpana kaleya.'poththakatta nerapa harimen dakwana mithradrohithwaye nindawenuth, ohu raka ganimen athwana rajadrohithwaye nindawenuth beremi.’ese aditan karagath he ugra wishak ka siya diwi thora kara gaththe ya.thaman wenuwen thama mithura diwi thorakara gath bawa dutu poththakatta da eya ma anugamanaya kale ya.itha la bala wiyedima pathra kalawata ha granthakaranayata piwisi hemapala munidasa surin pilibanda anshu mathrayaka ho awabodhayak ohu ‘sinhala bauddhaya’ pathrayata liyu ee kathawen ada patakayata labenu atha.idin ohu gana kiyawa balimath mathu parapurata ee danuma dimath obage yuthukamaya.wallampitiye, kuruniyawaththe, somasiri kasthuriaarachchi mahatha wisin yomu karana lada satahanak asurini.
